thread.title: Frozen's Princess Anna calls little girl battling a brain tumor
thread.title_full: Frozen's Princess Anna calls little girl battling a brain tumor | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Frozen's Princess Anna calls little girl battling a brain tumor
text:
This is one of those OMG moments for a little girl and her family.
Last month, Avery Huffman was diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor, according to her family's Caring Bridge webpage .
And like nearly any little girl, loves the Disney movie Frozen.
>> Read more trending stories
Imagine Avery's surprise when Princess Anna herself, OK not Anna because she's not real, but the voice of Anna, Kristen Bell left a voicemail on the family's phone, Entertainment Tonight reported.
And of course, the video is posted to YouTube .
At one point, "Anna" stops to receive a message from Queen Elsa, that declared Avery an honorary princess of Arendelle for her bravery.
She ends the call by saying, "Well, I got to build a snowman with my friend Olaf now."
